picked_headlines.summary: Semantic Edge-Cloud Communication for Real-Time Urban Traffic Surveillance with ViT and LLMs over Mobile Networks
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article highlights a practical application of AI in urban traffic management, showcasing the integration of ViT and LLMs to enhance real-time surveillance. It's relevant for both technical audiences and stakeholders interested in smart city solutions.

picked_headlines.summary: Experience Deploying Containerized GenAI Services at an HPC Center
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article provides insights into deploying GenAI workloads in HPC environments, offering valuable lessons for engineers and management on integrating cloud and Kubernetes technologies.

digest:
- *PLaMo 2* introduces efficient Japanese LLMs with hybrid architecture, achieving state-of-the-art results through innovative training methods. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.04897)
- *VITA* is an AI-driven platform enhancing data science education with adaptive learning and formative assessments via a chatbot. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.20369)
- *Recon-Act* is a self-evolving multi-agent system enhancing web task execution through a feedback loop of tool generation and action refinement. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.21072)
- *PIRF* optimizes diffusion models by using physics-informed rewards, enhancing output fidelity and efficiency in scientific generative tasks. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.20570)
- *DS-MoE* enhances transformer efficiency by using depth-specialized experts for tailored reasoning, improving speed and accuracy. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.20577)
- *ButterflyQuant* introduces learnable butterfly transforms for better LLM quantization, improving performance with adaptive rotations. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.09679)
- *Dual-Path Phishing Detection* combines NLP and URL analysis, improving accuracy and efficiency in identifying phishing threats. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.20972)
- *SwasthLLM* is a novel framework for multilingual medical diagnosis, achieving high accuracy without language-specific tuning. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.20567)
- *Semantic Edge-Cloud Communication* for efficient urban traffic surveillance using ViT and LLMs, reducing data transmission size significantly. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.21259)
- *Experience Deploying Containerized GenAI Services* at an HPC Center, detailing integration with cloud, Kubernetes, and practical insights for future research. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.20603)
